name: interaction-viewer
description: Display interaction information for different proteins and overlay information about diseases and subcellular location.

scripts.build: rm dist/* && mkdir -p dist && cp images/*.svg dist && browserify src/main.js --outfile dist/interaction-viewer.js --debug --transform babelify && uglifyjs dist/interaction-viewer.js -o dist/interaction-viewer.min.js && npm run sass:dist && cp node_modules/webcomponentsjs/micro.js dist/ && cp index.html dist/
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src -w styles/main.scss -w index.html -x 'npm run build && npm run sass'
scripts.deploy: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.serve: npm run watch & npm run browsersync

author: Xavier Watkins <xavier.watkins@gmail.com>
